name: Sebastian Rehm
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I started working with JS during my studies and the ease of just needing a text editor and a browser got me hooked. Since then I've worked with JS in a lot of projects, on the server and the client side.
what_can_i_contribute: Vue/Nuxt, React, TailwindCSS, Storybook, Graphql in React/Vue, React Native with Expo
